title: The Restrap Solstice Century is Back for 2021
content:
Our friends at Restrap are once again organizing their Solstice Century ride. This time around theyâ€™re encouraging riders to make the most of the longest days of the year over the Summer Solstice weekend of the 19th and 20th of June. The challenge this year is to ride one 100 mile ride on either day. The ride can be outdoors, indoors, on any terrain, and on any bike, so go nuts!

Learn more about how you can win a free patch and other goods at Restrap!
